src:
Gedung Kosong di Ancol Kebakaran, 14 Damkar Dikerahkan
04 Nov 2019, 23:52 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Sebuah gedung milik Hailai mengalami kebakaran. Sudin Pemadam Kebakaran Jakut mengerahkan 14 unit mobil ke lokasi tersebut.
"Betul, untuk saat ini 14 unit mobil pemadam sudah di lokasi," ucap petugas Dinas Pemadam Kebakaran DKI, Jono, saat dimintai konfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Lokasi kebakaran tepatnya berada di Jalan Pelabuhan Ratu No 8 RW 11, Ancol, Pademangan, Jakarta Utara. Jono mengatakan gedung yang terbakar sudah tidak terpakai.
"Jadi gedung sudah tidak terpakai, tapi gedung miliki Hailai," imbuh dia.
Kebakaran tersebut terjadi sekitar pukul 23.00 WIB. Saat ini petugas sedang memadamkan api di lokasi. Penyebab kebakaran belum diketahui karena masih dalam proses pemadaman.

(fai/idn)
text:
Empty Building in Ancol Fires, 14 Damkar Deployed
Nov 04 2019, 23:52 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - A building belonging to Hailai suffered a fire. North Jakarta Fire Department Sub-dept. Sent 14 cars to the location.
"That's right, for now 14 units of fire trucks are already on location," said Jakarta Fire Department official Jono, when asked for confirmation, Monday (11/04/2019).
The exact location of the fire was on Jalan Pelabuhan Ratu No 8 RW 11, Ancol, Pademangan, North Jakarta. Jono said the burning building was not used.
"So the building is not used, but the building is owned by Hailai," he added.
The fire occurred around 23:00 WIB. Currently the officer is putting out the fire at the location. The cause of the fire is unknown because it is still in the process of extinction.

(fai / idn)
